snippet: East Timor’s president has chosen an opposition party member, Rui Maria de Araújo, as the nation’s new prime minister, his office announced Wednesday.
abstract: Opposition party member Rui Maria de Araujo is appointed prime minister of East Timor, replacing Xanana Gusmao.
lead_paragraph: East Timor’s president has chosen an opposition party member, Rui Maria de Araújo, as the nation’s new prime minister, his office announced Wednesday.

headline.main: East Timor: Opposition Figure Is Named Prime Minister
headline.print_headline: East Timor: Opposition Figure Is Named Prime Minister
